definitions.definition: A former Turkish , Egyptian , Hungarian , and Romanian unit of weight , usually of a little more than a kilogram .
A unit of volume in Egypt (and formerly Turkey) corresponding to about 1.2 litres.

main_definition: ( historical ) A former Turkish , Egyptian , Hungarian , and Romanian unit of weight , usually of a little more than a kilogram .
secondary_definitions: A unit of volume in Egypt (and formerly Turkey) corresponding to about 1.2 litres.
